title: Z For Zachariah
description: This is a previously-published edition of ISBN 9780006710813. You can find all editions of this work here A gripping, thought-provoking story about life after a nuclear holocaust, by a Newbery Medalist.Ann Burden is sixteen years old and completely alone. The world as she once knew it is gone, ravaged by a nuclear war that has taken everyone from her. For the past year, she has lived in a remote valley with no evidence of any other survivors. But the smoke from a distant campfire shatters Ann's solitude. Someone else is still alive and making his way toward the valley. Who is this man? What does he want? Can he be trusted? Both excited and terrified, Ann soon realizes there may be worse things than being the last person on Earth.Just as Adam was the first man on earth, so this man must be Zachariah, the last...
author: Robert C. O'Brien
